description: Detects an Antivirus alert in a highly relevant file path or with a relevant file name
name: Antivirus Relevant File Paths Alerts
query: (Filename:(C\:\\Windows\\* OR C\:\\Temp\\* OR C\:\\PerfLogs\\* OR C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR C\:\\Users\\Default\\*) OR Filename:(*\\Client\\* OR *\\tsclient\\* OR *\\inetpub\\* OR *\/www\/* OR *apache* OR *tomcat* OR *nginx* OR *weblogic*) OR Filename:(*.ps1 OR *.psm1 OR *.vbs OR *.bat OR *.cmd OR *.sh OR *.chm OR *.xml OR *.txt OR *.jsp OR *.jspx OR *.asp OR *.aspx OR *.ashx OR *.asax OR *.asmx OR *.php OR *.cfm OR *.py OR *.pyc OR *.pl OR *.rb OR *.cgi OR *.war OR *.ear OR *.hta OR *.lnk OR *.scf OR *.sct OR *.vbe OR *.wsf OR *.wsh OR *.gif OR *.png OR *.jpg OR *.jpeg OR *.svg OR *.dat))
author: Florian Roth
Arnim Rupp
